}\n    }\n\n    /**\n     * @dev Return the log in base 256 of a positive value rounded towards zero.\n     * Returns 0 if given 0.\n     *\n     * Adding one to the result gives the number of pairs SPDX-License-Identifier: MIT\npragma solidity ^0.8.20;\n\nimport \"hardhat/console.sol\";\nimport \"@openzeppelin/contracts/token/ERC20/utils/SafeERC20.sol\";\nimport \"@openzeppelin/contracts/access/Ownable.sol\";\nimport \"@openzeppelin/contracts/token/ERC1155/ERC1155.sol\";\nimport \"@openzeppelin/contracts/token/ERC1155/extensions/ERC1155Supply.sol\";\nimport \"@openzeppelin/contracts/utils/ReentrancyGuard.sol\";\n\nimport \"../interfaces/ICurve.sol\";\nimport \"../interfaces/IFarmer.sol\";\n\ncontract IndieX is Ownable, ERC1155, ERC1155Supply, ReentrancyGuard {\n  using SafeERC20 for IERC20;\n\n  struct UpsertAppInput {\n    string name;\n    string uri;\n    address feeTo;\n    uint256 appFeePercent;\n    uint256 creatorFeePercent;\n  }\n\n  struct App {\n    uint256 id;\n    address creator;\n    string name;\n    string uri;\n    address feeTo;\n    uint256 appFeePercent; // default 0.02 ether, 2%\n    uint256 creatorFeePercent; // 0.05 ether, 5%\n  }\n\n  struct NewCreationInput {\n    string name;\n    uint256 appId;\n    uint8 farmer;\n    uint8 curve;\n    uint256[] curveArgs;\n    string uri;\n  }\n\n  struct UpdateCreationInput {\n    string name;\n    string uri;\n  }\n\n  struct Creation {\n    uint256 id;\n    address creator;\n    uint256 appId;\n    string name;\n    string uri;\n    uint8 farmer;\n    uint8 curve;\n    uint256[] curveArgs;\n    uint256 balance;\n    uint256 volume;\n  }\n\n  uint8 public curveIndex = 0;\n  mapping(uint8 curveId => address curve) public curves;\n\n  uint8 public farmerIndex = 0;\n  mapping(uint8 farmerId => address farmer) public farmers;\n\n  uint256 public appIndex;\n  mapping(uint256 appId => App) public apps;\n\n  uint256 public creationIndex;\n  mapping(uint256 creationId => Creation creation) public creations;\n\n  mapping(address account => uint256[] creationId) public userCreations;\n\n  uint256 ethAmount = 0;\n\n  uint256 public constant CREATOR_PREMINT = 1 ether;\n  uint256 public protocolFeePercent = 0.005 ether; // 0.5%\n\n  event NewApp(\n    uint256 id,\n    address indexed creator,\n    string name,\n    string uri,\n    address feeTo,\n    uint256 appFeePercent,\n    uint256 creatorFeePercent\n  );\n\n  event UpdateApp(\n    uint256 id,\n    address indexed creator,\n    string name,\n    string uri,\n    address feeTo,\n    uint256 appFeePercent,\n    uint256 creatorFeePercent\n  );\n\n  event NewCreation(\n    uint256 indexed creationId,\n    address indexed creator,\n    uint256 indexed appId,\n    string name,\n    string uri,\n    uint8 curveId,\n    uint8 farmerId\n  );\n\n  event UpdateCreation(\n    uint256 indexed creationId,\n    address indexed creator,\n    uint256 indexed appId,\n    string name,\n    string uri\n  );\n\n  event Trade(\n    TradeType indexed tradeType,\n    uint256 indexed creationId,\n    address indexed sender,\n    uint256 tokenAmount,\n    uint256 fundAmount,\n    uint256 creatorFee,\n    uint256 appFee\n  );\n\n  enum TradeType {\n    Mint,\n    Buy,\n    Sell\n  }\n\n  constructor(address initialOwner) ERC1155(\"\") Ownable(initialOwner) {}\n\n  fallback() external payable {}\n\n  receive() external payable {}\n\n  function addCurve(address curve) external {\n    curves[curveIndex] = curve;\n    curveIndex++;\n  }\n\n  function addFarmer(address farmer) external {\n    farmers[farmerIndex] = farmer;\n    farmerIndex++;\n  }\n\n  function newApp(UpsertAppInput memory input) external {\n    apps[appIndex] = App(\n      appIndex,\n      msg.sender,\n      input.name,\n      input.uri,\n      input.feeTo,\n      input.appFeePercent,\n      input.creatorFeePercent\n    );\n\n    emit NewApp(appIndex, msg.sender, input.name, input.uri, input.feeTo, input.appFeePercent, input.creatorFeePercent);\n\n    appIndex++;\n  }\n\n  function updateApp(uint256 id, UpsertAppInput memory input) external {\n    App storage app = apps[id];\n    require(app.creator != address(0), \"App not existed\");\n    require(app.creator == msg.sender, \"Only creator can update App\");\n    apps[appIndex] = App(\n      app.id,\n      msg.sender,\n      input.name,\n      input.uri,\n      input.feeTo,\n      input.appFeePercent,\n      input.creatorFeePercent\n    );\n    emit UpdateApp(\n      app.id,\n      msg.sender,\n      input.name,\n      input.uri,\n      input.feeTo,\n      input.appFeePercent,\n      input.creatorFeePercent\n    );\n  }\n\n  function newCreation(NewCreationInput memory input) public {\n    address creator = msg.sender;\n    creations[creationIndex] = Creation(\n      creationIndex,\n      creator,\n      input.appId,\n      input.name,\n      input.uri,\n      input.farmer,\n      input.curve,\n      input.curveArgs,\n      0,\n      0\n    );\n    userCreations[creator].push(creationIndex);\n    _mint(msg.sender, creationIndex, CREATOR_PREMINT, \"\");\n    emit NewCreation(creationIndex, creator, input.appId, input.name, input.uri, input.curve, input.farmer);\n\n    creationIndex++;\n  }\n\n  function updateCreation(uint256 id, UpdateCreationInput memory input) external {\n    Creation storage creation = creations[id];\n    require(creation.creator != address(0), \"App not existed\");\n    require(creation.creator == msg.sender, \"Only creator can update Creation\");\n    creation.name = input.name;\n    creation.uri = input.uri;\n    emit UpdateCreation(creation.id, creation.creator, creation.appId, input.name, input.uri);\n  }\n\n  function buy(uint256 creationId, uint256 amount) external payable nonReentrant {\n    require(creationId < creationIndex, \"Creation not existed\");\n    Creation storage creation = creations[creationId];\n    (uint256 buyPriceAfterFee, uint256 buyPrice, uint256 creatorFee, uint256 appFee) = getBuyPriceAfterFee(\n      creationId,\n      amount,\n      creation.appId\n    );\n\n    require(msg.value >= buyPriceAfterFee, \"Insufficient payment\");\n\n    address farmer = farmers[creation.farmer];\n\n    _mint(msg.sender, creationId, amount, \"\");\n    emit Trade(TradeType.Buy, creationId, msg.sender, amount, buyPriceAfterFee, creatorFee, appFee);\n\n    _safeTransferETH(address(farmer), buyPrice);\n    IFarmer(farmer).deposit();\n    ethAmount += buyPrice;\n    creation.balance += buyPrice;\n    creation.volume += buyPrice;\n\n    _safeTransferETH(creation.creator, creatorFee);\n\n    if (appFee > 0) {\n      App memory app = apps[creationId];\n      _safeTransferETH(app.feeTo, appFee);\n    }\n\n    uint256 refundAmount = msg.value - buyPriceAfterFee;\n    if (refundAmount > 0) {\n      _safeTransferETH(msg.sender, refundAmount);\n    }\n  }\n\n  function sell(uint256 creationId, uint256 amount) public nonReentrant {\n    require(creationId < creationIndex, \"Creation not existed\");\n    Creation storage creation = creations[creationId];\n    (uint256 sellPriceAfterFee, uint256 sellPrice, uint256 creatorFee, uint256 appFee) = getSellPriceAfterFee(\n      creationId,\n      amount,\n      creation.appId\n    );\n\n    address farmer = farmers[creation.farmer];\n    IFarmer(farmer).withdraw(sellPrice);\n    ethAmount -= sellPrice;\n    creation.balance -= sellPrice;\n    creation.volume += sellPrice;\n\n    _burn(msg.sender, creationId, amount);\n\n    emit Trade(TradeType.Buy, creationId, msg.sender, amount, sellPriceAfterFee, creatorFee, appFee);\n\n    _safeTransferETH(msg.sender, sellPriceAfterFee);\n    _safeTransferETH(creation.creator, creatorFee);\n\n    if (appFee > 0) {\n      App memory app = apps[creationId];\n      _safeTransferETH(app.feeTo, appFee);\n    }\n  }\n\n  function getBuyPrice(uint256 creationId, uint256 amount) public view returns (uint256) {\n    uint256 supply = totalSupply(creationId);\n    Creation memory creation = creations[creationId];\n    return ICurve(curves[creation.curve]).getPrice(supply, amount, creation.curveArgs);\n  }\n\n  function getSellPrice(uint256 creationId, uint256 amount) public view returns (uint256) {\n    uint256 supply = totalSupply(creationId);\n    Creation memory creation = creations[creationId];\n    return ICurve(curves[creation.curve]).getPrice(supply - amount, amount, creation.curveArgs);\n  }\n\n  function getBuyPriceAfterFee(\n    uint256 creationId,\n    uint256 amount,\n    uint256 appId\n  ) public view returns (uint256 buyPriceAfterFee, uint256 buyPrice, uint256 creatorFee, uint256 appFee) {\n    App memory app = apps[appId];\n    buyPrice = getBuyPrice(creationId, amount);\n    creatorFee = (buyPrice * app.creatorFeePercent) / 1 ether;\n    appFee = (buyPrice * app.appFeePercent) / 1 ether;\n    buyPriceAfterFee = buyPrice + appFee + creatorFee;\n  }\n\n  function getSellPriceAfterFee(\n    uint256 creationId,\n    uint256 amount,\n    uint256 appId\n  ) public view returns (uint256 sellPriceAfterFee, uint256 sellPrice, uint256 creatorFee, uint256 appFee) {\n    App memory app = apps[appId];\n    sellPrice = getSellPrice(creationId, amount);\n    creatorFee = (sellPrice * app.creatorFeePercent) / 1 ether;\n    appFee = (sellPrice * app.appFeePercent) / 1 ether;\n    sellPriceAfterFee = sellPrice - appFee - creatorFee;\n  }\n\n  function getApp(uint256 id) public view returns (App memory) {\n    return apps[id];\n  }\n\n  function getCreation(uint256 id) public view returns (Creation memory) {\n    return creations[id];\n  }\n\n  function getUserCreations(address creator) public view returns (uint256[] memory) {\n    return userCreations[creator];\n  }\n\n  function creationSupply(uint256 id) public view returns (uint256) {\n    return totalSupply(id);\n  }\n\n  function getUserLatestCreation(address creator) public view returns (Creation memory creation) {\n    uint256[] memory creationIds = userCreations[creator];\n\n    if (creationIds.length > 0) {\n      uint256 latestCreationId = creationIds[creationIds.length - 1];\n      creation = creations[latestCreationId];\n    }\n\n    return creation;\n  }\n\n  function _safeTransferETH(address to, uint256 value) internal {\n    (bool success, ) = to.call{ value: value }(new bytes(0));\n    require(success, \"ETH transfer failed\");\n  }\n\n  function _update(\n    address from,\n    address to,\n    uint256[] memory ids,\n    uint256[] memory values\n  ) internal override(ERC1155, ERC1155Supply) {\n    super._update(from, to, ids, values);\n  }\n}\n","keccak256":"0x6837cc049717b1c2d4e49dcefd551c4b49482f0cb44fb738615737f2f863e787","license":"MIT"},"contracts/interfaces/ICurve.sol":{"content":"// SPDX-License-Identifier: MIT\n\npragma solidity ^0.8.20;\n\ninterface ICurve {\n  function getPrice(uint256 supply, uint256 amount, uint256[] calldata args) external view returns (uint256);\n}\n","keccak256":"0xd5c33c3805f632920847c5aca6726ea196a9cc3f0f686853c1ce83dbcce63243","license":"MIT"},"contracts/interfaces/IFarmer.sol":{"content":"// SPDX-License-Identifier: (uint256 withdrawableETHAmount);\n\n  function yieldToken() external view returns (address);\n\n  function yieldMaxClaimable(uint256 depositedETHAmount) external view returns (uint256 maxClaimableETH);\n}\n","keccak256":"0xed9573453a074d41ac92ec03deb1062c96b6f03bbbcd8f25b04b05d64df477db","license":"MIT"},"hardhat/console.sol":{"content":"// SPDX-License-Identifier: MIT\npragma ERC1155InsufficientBalance(address,uint2.details: Indicates an error related to the current `balance` of a `sender`. Used in transfers.

params.balance: Current balance for the interacting account.
params.needed: Minimum amount required to perform a transfer.
params.sender: Address whose tokens are being transferred.

ERC1155InvalidApprover(address).details: Indicates a failure with the `approver` of a token to be approved. Used in approvals.

ERC1155InvalidArrayLength(uint256,uint25.details: Indicates an array length mismatch between ids and values in a safeBatchTransferFrom operation. Used in batch transfers.

params.idsLength: Length of the array of token identifiers
params.valuesLength: Length of the array of token amounts

ERC1155InvalidOperator(address).details: Indicates a failure with the `operator` to be approved. Used in approvals.

params.operator: Address that may be allowed to operate on tokens without being their owner.

ERC1155InvalidReceiver(address).details: Indicates a failure with the token `receiver`. Used in transfers.

params.receiver: Address to which tokens are being transferred.

ERC1155InvalidSender(address).details: Indicates a failure with the token `sender`. Used in transfers.

params.sender: Address whose tokens are being transferred.

ERC1155MissingApprovalForAll(address,add.details: Indicates a failure with the `operator`’s approval. Used in transfers.

params.operator: Address that may be allowed to operate on tokens without being their owner.
params.owner: Address of the current owner of a token.

OwnableInvalidOwner(address).details: The owner is not a valid owner account. (eg. `address(0)`)

OwnableUnauthorizedAccount(address).details: The caller account is not authorized to perform an operation.

ApprovalForAll(address,address,bool).details: Emitted when `account` grants or revokes permission to `operator` to transfer their tokens, according to `approved`.

TransferBatch(address,address,address,ui.details: Equivalent to multiple {TransferSingle} events, where `operator`, `from` and `to` are the same for all transfers.

TransferSingle(address,address,address,u.details: Emitted when `value` amount of tokens of type `id` are transferred from `from` to `to` by `operator`.

URI(string,uint256).details: Emitted when the URI for token type `id` changes to `value`, if it is a non-programmatic URI. If an {URI} event was emitted for `id`, the standard https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-1155#metadata-extensions[guarantees] that `value` will equal the value returned by {IERC1155MetadataURI-uri}.

balanceOfBatch(address[],uint256[]).details: See {IERC1155-balanceOfBatch}. Requirements: - `accounts` and `ids` must have the same length.

exists(uint256).details: Indicates whether any token exist with a given id, or not.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

totalSupply(uint256).details: Total value of tokens in with a given id.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

uri(uint256).details: See {IERC1155MetadataURI-uri}. This implementation returns the same URI for *all* token types. It relies on the token type ID substitution mechanism https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-1155#metadata[defined in the EIP]. Clients calling this function must replace the `\{id\}` substring with the actual token type ID.
